bibl.title: The Case of Onesimos: An Interpretation of Paulâ€™s Letter to Philemon Based on Documentary Papyri and Ostraca
bibl.note: Introduction. - 1. The Importance of Papyri and Ostraca for Interpreting New Testament Texts. - 2. Onesimos's Situation When Paul Wrote His Letter to Philemon: 2.1. Onesimos's Name and Origin; - 2.2. Onesimos's Occupation; - 2.3. Onesimos - a roaming slave. - 3. The Aim of Paul's Letter to Philemon.
ARZT-GRABNER Peter, The Case of Onesimos: An Interpretation of Paul's Letter to Philemon Based on Documentary Papyri and Ostraca.
